{
    "common": {
        "type": "nested",
        "value": {
            "setting1": {
                "type": "unchanged",
                "value": "Value 1"
            },
            "setting2": {
                "type": "deleted",
                "value": 200
            },
            "setting3": {
                "type": "unchanged",
                "value": true
            },
            "setting6": {
                "type": "deleted",
                "value": {
                    "key": "value"
                }
            },
            "setting4": {
                "type": "added",
                "value": "blah blah"
            },
            "setting5": {
                "type": "added",
                "value": {
                    "key5": "value5"
                }
            }
        }
    },
    "group1": {
        "type": "nested",
        "value": {
            "baz": {
                "type": "changed",
                "value": {
                    "old": "bas",
                    "new": "bars"
                }
            },
            "foo": {
                "type": "unchanged",
                "value": "bar"
            }
        }
    },
    "group2": {
        "type": "deleted",
        "value": {
            "abc": 12345
        }
    },
    "group3": {
        "type": "added",
        "value": {
            "fee": 100500
        }
    }
}
